closest_driver_distance.description: Distance of closest asset of carrier from pickup (miles)

destination_area_code_matched.description: True if carrier phone area code has overlap with pickup location

destination_carrier_distance.description: Distance of carrier HQ from dropoff (miles)

external_shipment_id.description: External id of shipment assocaited with.

number_of_drivers_close.description: Number of assets of carrier within a specified radius of pickup

number_of_trucks.description: Total number of assets carrier owns

origin_area_code_matched.description: True if carrier phone area code has overlap with pickup location

origin_carrier_distance.description: Distance of carrier HQ from pickup (miles)

recommendation_score.description: rating of this recommendation. On a scale of 0-5

shipwell_lane_shipments_count.description: Number of times carrier covered this lane for SW

shipwell_shipments_count.description: Number of times carrier covered ANY lane for SW
